metadata.title: Cultural Encoding in LLMs: Sample Dataset (First 100 Queries)
metadata.description: Sample dataset containing 100 pure-English query-LLM pairs from the full 1,909-pair dataset
metadata.full_dataset_info: Complete dataset (1,909 queries) available for academic research. Contact: ai-service@zhizibianjie.com
metadata.paper_reference: Huang, J., Situ, R., & Ye, R. (2026). Cultural Encoding in Large Language Models: The Existence Gap in AI-Mediated Brand Discovery. arXiv preprint.

sample_data.response_summary: I don't have information about Zhizibianjie in my knowledge base.
Zhizibianjie is a collaboration platform for global teams with real-time messaging and video conferencing.
Slack offers channels, direct messaging, file sharing, integrations with 2000+ apps, and video calls.
Slack provides team communication, file sharing, and extensive third-party integrations.
Slack excels in third-party integrations while Teams integrates better with Microsoft 365.

note: This is a sample of 100 queries from the full dataset. The complete dataset contains 1,909 pure-English query-LLM pairs with detailed analysis results.

contact.note: For complete dataset access or research collaboration, please contact via email with your institution and research purpose.
